    • Uses of NumberColorMap in org.diirt.graphene

      Fields in org.diirt.graphene declared as NumberColorMap 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.BONE
      BONE ranges from black to white passing from blue.
      static NumberColorMap IntensityGraph2DRenderer.DEFAULT_COLOR_MAP
      Default color map: JET.
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.GRAY
      GRAY ranges from black to white.
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.HOT
      HOT ranges from black to white passing from red and yellow.
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.HSV
      HSV goes through the color wheel: red, yellow, green, cyan, blue, magenta and back to red.
      static NumberColorMap NumberColorMaps.JET
      JET ranges from blue to red, going through cyan and yellow.
